Stargazer Data API
Table of Contents

Namespace Stargazer

Classes

ASTRALPLANEAlbedo

Handles the transparency of the floor. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025

AzimuthGridlines

The graphic object used to draw the lines. Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025

CelestialBody

Represents a body drawn in 3D space that can be viewed, hovered and targeted. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

CompassNeedle

Displays a compass needle to orient the user relative to North. Author: Logan Parker Refactored By: Josh Johner (moved needle.RotationDegrees from _Process() to RotationHandler Created: SPR 2025

Constellations

The Godot.Node3D used to contain the constellation stars and lines in the viewport. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) for concurrency and observer patterns.

Constellations2D

The Godot.Node2D used to contain the constellation stars and lines in the viewport. Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025

ControlContainer

Contains all user controls for the program and notifies subscribers of user interaction. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

Globals

Currently is no longer being used due to Actions and Delegates

GridLabel

Displays the latitude value on the grid. Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) to use observer pattern.

HoverLabel

The label that is displayed when hovering over an IHoverable object. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) to use observer pattern.

LabelNode

Contains the constellation label. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025

MainCamera

Contains the main camera used to create the user view. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) to use ICameraStateNotifier to implement observer pattern.

MessierObject

A Messier Deep Space Object drawn in the sky. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by William Arnett (SPR 2025) to implement hover text.

Moon

A moon object to be drawn. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by William Arnett (SPR 2025) to handle rotation and get hover text.

Planet

Used to draw a planet in the SkyView Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by William Arnett (SPR 2025) to use custom shader material.

Planets

A Godot.Node3D container for the planets. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by William Arnett (SPR 2025) to use custom shader.

PlayControl

Controls the play speed of the 3D simulation. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Modified: SPR 2025 by Alex Lake to implement time lapse.

PlaySpeed

A state object to control the play speed of the simulation Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

SkyView

The parent object for all items in the viewport. Responsible for relaying notifications from senders throughout the program into the view port. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

SkyView2D

Used to create the 2D star scene (for screenshot export). Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) for containerization improvement.

SkyViewContainer

The parent container of the SkyView object (used for anchoring). Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

Spawner

Draws all stars that are not a part of constellations Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) for concurrency and single responsibility.

Spawner2D

Draws all stars that are not a part of constellations Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) to use IDictionary.

Star

A star that has been converted from Horizontal Coordinate form, into Godot coordinate form and drawn to the screen. Author: Logan Parker Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Josh Johner (SPR 2025) to implement CelestialBody

Star2D

A star that has been converted from Horizontal Coordinate form, into Godot coordinate form and drawn to the screen. Author: William Arnett Created: SPR 2025

StarMesh

This was originally created to explore adding color to the stars. The current implementation is way too aggressive. We might be able to make this work by tweaking the numbers. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

Startup

The top level controller for the program. Handles all communication between the GUI and the viewport. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by Alex Lake (SPR 2025) to implement screenshot.

Sun

The actual sun. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025 Refactored by William Arnett (SPR 2025) to handle rotation, and hover text.

Interfaces

ICameraStateNotifier

Notifies subscribers of events related to the Godot.Camera3D Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

IHoverable

Provides the ability of an object to display a hover label. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

ITrackable

Provides the ability of an object to be tracked by the camera Author: Josh Johenr Created: SPR 2025

Enums

ZoomState

Used to implement quantum logic in the view based on Fov thresholds. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

Made with docfx
